com.yantra.yfc.rcp

Interface IYRCMessageDisplayer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    YRCCallCenterMessageDisplayer, YRCStoreMessageDisplayer

    public interface IYRCMessageDisplayer
    Interface which needs to be implemented and registered with RCP Platform to display messages to the user.
    See Also:
    YRCPlatformUI.setStatusLineManager(Object)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      void showStatusMessage(java.lang.String message, boolean isError)
      Sets a message to the status line object.

    • Method Detail

      • showStatusMessage

        void showStatusMessage(java.lang.String message,
                       boolean isError)
        Sets a message to the status line object. Message is translated using user's locale using the given message bundle key. This only has effect if a status line manager is set using YRCPlatformUI.setStatusLineManager(Object).
        Parameters:
        message - The message to be displayed.

      • clearErrorMessage

        void clearErrorMessage()
        Clears the message if the current message being shown is of type error.
